casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Larry Anthony FINNEY. No. 93PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. David G. Belser, Joel B. Stevenson, Asheville, for Larry Anthony Finney. John P. Scherer, II, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 22nd day of February 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
